languages.text: "Оскверненные ксеносами творения опасны. С ними надлежит..." {n}Шепот прерывается, сменяясь тяжелым хриплым дыханием. Видимо, тихий голос {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножреца{/g} является не экстравагантной чертой, а последствием какого-то ранения. Отдышавшись, магос продолжает:{/n} "...надлежит блюсти осторожность".

traits.locale_text: "Оскверненные ксеносами творения Омнисии опасны. С ними надлежит..." {n}Шепот прерывается, сменяясь тяжелым хриплым дыханием. Видимо, тихий голос техножреца является не экстравагантной чертой, а последствием какого-то ранения. Отдышавшись, магос продолжает:{/n} "... надлежит блюсти осторожность".

languages.text: "Works that have been desecrated by xenos are dangerous. They warrant—" {n}His whispering cuts off, replaced by heavy, ragged breathing. It seems that the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s quiet voice is not an extravagant quirk, but rather a consequence of some injury. After catching his breath, Brasswhisper continues,{/n} "...warrant due caution."
languages.original_text: "Оскверненные ксеносами творения опасны. С ними надлежит..." {n}Шепот прерывается, сменяясь тяжелым хриплым дыханием. Видимо, тихий голос {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножреца{/g} является не экстравагантной чертой, а последствием какого-то ранения. Отдышавшись, магос продолжает:{/n} "...надлежит блюсти осторожность".

traits.locale_text: "Works of the Omnissiah that have been desecrated by xenos are dangerous. They warrant..." {n}His whispering cuts off, replaced by heavy, ragged breathing. It seems that his quiet voice is not an extravagant quirk, but rather a consequence of some injury. After catching his breath, Ironwhisper continues,{/n} "...warrant due caution."

"Works of the Omnissiah that have been desecrated by xenos are dangerous. They warrant..." {n}His whispering cuts off, replaced by heavy, ragged breathing. It seems that his quiet voice is not an extravagant quirk, but rather a consequence of some injury. After catching his breath, Ironwhisper continues,{/n} "...warrant due caution."

"Works that have been desecrated by xenos are dangerous. They warrant—" {n}His whispering cuts off, replaced by heavy, ragged breathing. It seems that the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest's{/g} quiet voice is not an extravagant quirk, but rather a consequence of some injury. After catching his breath, Brasswhisper continues,{/n} "...warrant due caution."

"Works that have been desecrated by xenos are dangerous. They warrant—" {n}His whispering cuts off, replaced by heavy, ragged breathing. It seems that the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest's{/g} quiet voice is not an extravagant quirk, but rather a consequence of some injury. After catching his breath, Brasswhisper continues,{/n} "...warrant due caution."

"Works that have been desecrated by xenos are dangerous. They warrant—" {n}His whispering cuts off, replaced by heavy, ragged breathing. It seems that the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s quiet voice is not an extravagant quirk, but rather a consequence of some injury. After catching his breath, Brasswhisper continues,{/n} "...warrant due caution."

languages.text: 「異種族に冒涜された仕掛けは危険だ。奴らは間違いなく…{n}ブラスウィスパーのつぶやきが中断されると、重く不規則な息遣いに変わる。{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}の静かな声は癖というより、怪我を負った結果だ。息を整えてから、ブラスウィスパーは続ける。{/n}「…間違いなく、十分な注意を要する」
languages.original_text: "Works that have been desecrated by xenos are dangerous. They warrant—" {n}His whispering cuts off, replaced by heavy, ragged breathing. It seems that the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s quiet voice is not an extravagant quirk, but rather a consequence of some injury. After catching his breath, Brasswhisper continues,{/n} "...warrant due caution."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族に冒涜された仕掛けは危険だ。奴らは間違いなく…{n}ブラスウィスパーのつぶやきが中断されると、重く不規則な息遣いに変わる。{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}の静かな声は癖というより、怪我を負った結果だ。息を整えてから、ブラスウィスパーは続ける。{/n}「…間違いなく、十分な注意を要する」

languages.text: “被异形亵渎的造物非常危险，它们应该……”{n}他的低语声戛然而止，取而代之的是粗重的呼吸声。看来，这位{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}之所以声音低沉，并不是出于某种怪癖，而是因为他的身体遭受了某种伤害。铜语喘了口气，随后继续说道。{/n}“……应该谨慎对待。”
languages.original_text: "Works that have been desecrated by xenos are dangerous. They warrant—" {n}His whispering cuts off, replaced by heavy, ragged breathing. It seems that the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s quiet voice is not an extravagant quirk, but rather a consequence of some injury. After catching his breath, Brasswhisper continues,{/n} "...warrant due caution."

traits.locale_text: “被异形亵渎的造物非常危险，它们应该……”{n}他的低语声戛然而止，取而代之的是粗重的呼吸声。看来，这位{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}之所以声音低沉，并不是出于某种怪癖，而是因为他的身体遭受了某种伤害。铜语喘了口气，随后继续说道。{/n}“……应该谨慎对待。”

languages.text: «Las obras profanadas por los xenos son peligrosas. Exigen...». {n}Una respiración rasgada interrumpe sus susurros. Parece que la voz queda del {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} no es fruto de una personalidad extravagante sino una consecuencia de alguna lesión. Tras recuperar el aliento, Susurro de latón continúa:{/n} «... Exigen una serie de precauciones».
languages.original_text: "Works that have been desecrated by xenos are dangerous. They warrant—" {n}His whispering cuts off, replaced by heavy, ragged breathing. It seems that the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s quiet voice is not an extravagant quirk, but rather a consequence of some injury. After catching his breath, Brasswhisper continues,{/n} "...warrant due caution."

traits.locale_text: «Las obras profanadas por los xenos son peligrosas. Exigen...» {n}Una respiración rasgada interrumpe sus susurros. Parece que la voz queda del {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} no es fruto de una personalidad extravagante sino una consecuencia de alguna lesión. Tras recuperar el aliento, Susurro de latón continúa:{/n} «... Exigen una serie de precauciones».

languages.text: « Les appareils profanés par les xénos sont on ne peut plus dangereux. Ils nécessitent... » {n}Son murmure s'interrompt pour laisser place à une respiration rauque et saccadée. Il semblerait que la voix chuchotante du {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} ne soit pas une excentricité, mais la conséquence d'une blessure. Après avoir repris son souffle, Murmecuivre poursuit :{/n} « Ils nécessitent de prendre des précautions. »
languages.original_text: "Works that have been desecrated by xenos are dangerous. They warrant—" {n}His whispering cuts off, replaced by heavy, ragged breathing. It seems that the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s quiet voice is not an extravagant quirk, but rather a consequence of some injury. After catching his breath, Brasswhisper continues,{/n} "...warrant due caution."

traits.locale_text: « Les appareils profanés par les xénos sont on ne peut plus dangereux. Ils nécessitent... » {n}Son murmure s'interrompt pour laisser place à une respiration rauque et saccadée. Il semblerait que la voix chuchotante du {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} ne soit pas une excentricité, mais la conséquence d'une blessure. Après avoir repris son souffle, Murmecuivre poursuit :{/n} « Ils nécessitent de prendre des précautions. »

languages.text: "Von Xenos entweihte Dinge sind gefährlich. Sie erfordern ..." {n}Sein Flüstern bricht ab und wird ersetzt durch schweres, röchelndes Atmen. Anscheinend ist die leise Stimme des {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriesters{/g} keine extravagante Eigenart, sondern eher das Resultat irgendeiner Verwundung. Nachdem er wieder zu Atem gekommen ist, fährt Messingflüsterer fort:{/n} "... sie erfordern angemessene Vorsicht."
languages.original_text: "Works that have been desecrated by xenos are dangerous. They warrant—" {n}His whispering cuts off, replaced by heavy, ragged breathing. It seems that the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s quiet voice is not an extravagant quirk, but rather a consequence of some injury. After catching his breath, Brasswhisper continues,{/n} "...warrant due caution."

traits.locale_text: "Von Xenos entweihte Dinge sind gefährlich. Sie erfordern ..." {n}Sein Flüstern bricht ab und wird ersetzt durch schweres, röchelndes Atmen. Anscheinend ist die leise Stimme des {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriesters{/g} keine extravagante Eigenart, sondern eher das Resultat irgendeiner Verwundung. Nachdem er wieder zu Atem gekommen ist, fährt Messingflüsterer fort:{/n} "... sie erfordern angemessene Vorsicht."

languages.text: "Zenoların lekelediği eserler tehlikelidir. Bunlarla..." {n}Fısıltısı yarıda kalıyor; güçlükle, düzensizce nefes alıp vermeye başlıyor. Görünüşe bakılırsa {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip'in{/g} sesinin kısık olması, bir acayipliğinden ziyade aldığı bir yaranın sonucu. Pirinçfısıltı, biraz soluklandıktan sonra lafına devam ediyor.{/n} "Dikkatli olmak gerekir."
languages.original_text: "Works that have been desecrated by xenos are dangerous. They warrant—" {n}His whispering cuts off, replaced by heavy, ragged breathing. It seems that the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s quiet voice is not an extravagant quirk, but rather a consequence of some injury. After catching his breath, Brasswhisper continues,{/n} "...warrant due caution."

traits.locale_text: "Zenoların leke sürdüğü eserler tehlikelidir. Bunlarla..." {n}Fısıltısı yarıda kalıyor; güçlükle ve düzensizce nefes alıp vermeye başlıyor. Görünüşe bakılırsa {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}'in sesinin kısık olması acayip bir özelliği değil de aldığı bir yaranın sonucu. Biraz soluklandıktan sonra Brasswhisper lafına devam ediyor.{/n} "...Dikkatli olmak gerekir."
